abstract: Critics of Denmark's new citizenship test for immigrants, which two-thirds of applicants recently failed, assert many native Danes would fail it; officials in ruling center-right government made 40-question test on Danish history, politics and culture purposely challenging amid European refugee crisis.
lead_paragraph: The government, which has been tightening rules on immigration, has made little effort to hide the goal of the exam: to make it significantly harder to become Danish.

headline.main: Denmark’s Tougher Citizenship Test Stumps Even Its Natives
headline.print_headline: Tougher Test on Citizenship Stumps Even  Native Danes

snippet: The government, which has been tightening rules on immigration, has made little effort to hide the goal of the exam: to make it significantly harder to become Danish....

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
